description:
Databases are required in almost every enterprise section of today like banks, hospitals, post offices, fast food restaurants, travel agencies and you name it. Not only in the above mentioned areas,it also plays a major key role in different social networking sites like Facebook,Twitter,Google+ and many more,which handles a huge Database. This course focuses on hand-on methods that enterprises use to store or extract data instantly. Data manipulation techniques have been demonstrated which allows you to analyze data as per business requirements.

At the end of the course, participants would learn/use/acquire the following techniques/knowledge:

  • Switching Views in Access
  • Entering and Editing Data
  • Working in Data Entry Mode
  • Sorting Data, Finding & Replacing Data
  • Importing from Access and Excel
  • Linking to an external Access Database Table
  • Linking to an Excel Workbook using the Wizard
  • Renaming and Copying Tables
title: Mastering Database Concepts - The Access Way
